sentences.sContent: So the left electrode will be the cathode as I have configured it, and the right electrode will be anode.
sentences.sContent_eng: So the left electrode will be the cathode as I have configured it, and the right electrode will be anode.
sentences.sCn: 因此左边电极就成了阴极,正如我原来设定的一样，右边的电极就是阳极。

sentences.sContent: Second, they are "activating" some of the inactive components, by freeing lithium from the inactive material so that it can move between the cathode and the anode.
sentences.sContent_eng: Second, they are "activating" some of the inactive components, by freeing lithium from the inactive material so that it can move between the cathode and the anode.
sentences.sCn: 其次，他们是“激活”消极的一些组件，通过释放从非活动的材料，以便可以移动它们之间的阴极和阳极锂。

sentences.sContent: The kit comes with an anode, a cathode, and an LED light.
sentences.sContent_eng: The kit comes with an anode, a cathode, and an LED light.
sentences.sCn: 这种套装电池包括一根阳极、一根阴极和一颗LED灯。

phrases.pCn: 阳极泥；阳极残渣；阳极沉积层

words.tran: 阳极电镀；作阳极化处理（等于anodise）

trans.tranOther: the part of a  battery  that collects  electron s  , often a wire or piece of metal with the sign (+)
